title: LodeRunner 2 for  Windows XP and Vista
description:
Lode Runner 2.

This great isometric game was adopted for XP and Vista.

To run this game use the following instructions:
1. Unpack all files.
2. Start install.exe
3. Find the game folder and copy 2 files from Patch_v11 (replace the original lr2.exe)
4. For Windows Vista:
- adjust the Compatibility settings of lr2.exe to start in Windows XP SP2 and disable the Desktop composition.
- launch the lr2.exe as Administrator
- Say "Yes" for resolution and color depth change.

Have fun!
